        <div class="contain fn-clear">
            <div class="container fn-clear">
                <div class="main">
                    
    <div class="article article-post">
    <h2 class="title">飞鸟集</h2>
    <div class="info">
        <span class="info-title"><i class="icon-calendar"></i> Published: </span>
        <span class="info-date">10 May 2015</span>
        <span class="info-title"><i class="icon-folder-open"></i> Category: </span>
        <span class="info-link"><a href="/StrayBirds/navigations/categories.html#生活-ref" >生活</a></span>
    </div>
    <h1>第一首</h1>

<p>夏天的飞鸟，飞到我的窗前唱歌，又飞去了。</p>

<p>秋天的黄叶，它们没有什么可唱，只叹息一声，飞落在那里。</p>

<h1>第二首</h1>

<p>世界对着它的爱人，把它浩翰的面具揭下了。</p>

<p>它变小了，小如一首歌，小如一回永恒的接吻。　　　　</p>

    <nav class="article-previous fn-clear">
        
        <a class="prev" href="/StrayBirds//%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF/2014/09/20/java-concurrency.html" rel="bookmark">&laquo;&nbsp;Java 中的并发</a>
        
        
    </nav>
    <div class="comment">
        
            
        
    </div>
